name: Wood Elf Scout
description: The Wood Elf Scout is a specialized humanoid with a lean build, skilled in stealth and reconnaissance, armed with a shortsword and longbow for combat.
memorable: Its exceptional agility and keen senses make it an adept scout capable of detecting hidden foes.
goals: Designed for stealth operations, scouting, and ambush tactics.
relations: Often encountered with other elves or in elven communities.
environment: Typically found in forests or wooded areas.
strengths: High Dexterity allows for effective ranged attacks and stealth capabilities.
weaknesses: Relatively low in direct confrontations due to low Hit Points and Armor Class.
attacks: Uses a shortsword for melee combat and a longbow for ranged attacks, both dealing piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Keen Hearing and Sight grants advantage on Perception checks related to hearing or sight.
senses: Possesses keen senses with a passive Perception score of 16 for detecting threats.
skills: Proficient in stealth and perception, making it highly effective in scouting situations.
additional_information: Excels at ranged combat with a longbow.
Can climb effectively, enhancing its scouting capabilities.
Moderate durability with AC 15 and 19 Hit Points.
test_queries: agile elf scout with a longbow
wood elf with keen hearing and sight
wood elf that is effective in ambushes
